title: Create editor-context-menu.ts Lit component with TDD
description:
Create the context menu UI component:
- Use menuCSS, buttonCSS from shared-styles
- Position at x,y coordinates via openAt({x, y})
- Click-outside-close and Escape key dismiss
- Conditional Take Photo for mobile (isMobile property)
- Dispatch custom events: upload-image-requested, format-bold-requested, etc.
- Create test file and Storybook stories

title: Create editor-upload-service.ts with TDD
description:
Create service for file upload:
- selectAndUploadImage() - creates hidden file input, opens picker
- selectAndUploadFile() - any file type
- capturePhoto() - accept=image/* capture=environment
- uploadFile(file) - POST to /uploads, parse Location header, return markdown
- insertMarkdownAtCursor(textarea, markdown) - insert + trigger keyup for save
- Create test file

title: Critique PR as panel of software development greats
description: After PR is ready, have the implementation reviewed by a simulated panel of software development luminaries (e.g., Martin Fowler, Kent Beck, Uncle Bob, etc.) commenting in their characteristic styles on the code quality, patterns used, and areas for improvement.

title: Review error handling for conformance to repo standards
description:
Critically review all error handling in the new code to ensure conformance to CLAUDE.md standards:
- Error wrapping pattern: wrap and return with context, never log in services
- Boundary handling pattern: check, act, and log once at boundaries
- Use errors.Is/errors.As for type checking, not message matching
- No try/catch without meaningful recovery
- No hidden failures or fake placeholder values
- Explicit error state in all code paths

title: Add editor context menu for image upload and text formatting
description: Add a right-click (desktop) / long-press (mobile) context menu to the markdown editor textarea. Menu options: Upload Image, Upload File, Take Photo (mobile), Bold, Italic, Insert Link. Position menu at cursor/touch point. Implement as Lit web component following existing patterns.

title: Hide system-info component in edit mode on mobile
description: The system-info component (shows version info) interferes with editing on mobile devices. Hide it when in edit mode to improve the mobile editing experience.

title: Make bold/italic formatting toggles instead of always adding markers
description: When text is already wrapped in bold (**) or italic (*) markers, clicking the button should remove the markers instead of adding more. Detect if selection is already wrapped and toggle accordingly.

title: Refactor mobile interaction from long-press to toolbar
description: The long-press interaction interferes with text selection on mobile devices. Redesign to use a toolbar that appears above or below the textarea on mobile, while keeping context menu for desktop.

title: Polish and cross-browser testing
description:
Final polish:
- Manual testing on desktop (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- Manual testing on mobile (iOS Safari, Android Chrome)
- Adjust long-press timing if conflicts with text selection
- Edge detection for menu positioning (flip if near viewport edge)

title: Create editor-context-menu-coordinator.ts and integrate
description:
Create coordinator to orchestrate everything:
- Listen for contextmenu event on textarea (desktop right-click)
- Listen for pointerdown/pointerup/pointermove for long-press detection (500ms timeout, >10px movement cancels)
- Route menu events to appropriate services
- Store cursor position before actions, restore after upload
- Add to index.ts and index.tmpl
- Create test file

title: Create text-formatting-service.ts with TDD
description:
Create service for markdown formatting:
- wrapBold(text, start, end) - wraps selection in **...**
- wrapItalic(text, start, end) - wraps selection in *...*
- insertLink(text, start, end, url?) - wraps in [selection](url)
- Returns { newText, newSelectionStart, newSelectionEnd }
- Create test file
